timeline.message: change versioned account for tests variable names
Regenerate client from swagger. Fix swagger generation README.md.

timeline.bodyText: Looks like this is double generated? Shouldn't there only be the ListBlobContainersIncludeType in the public API and this isn't needed?
timeline.author: alzimmermsft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,55 @@
+// Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
+// Licensed under the MIT License.
+// Code generated by Microsoft (R) AutoRest Code Generator.
+
+package com.azure.storage.blob.implementation.models;

timeline.bodyText: Should this and ListBlobContainersIncludeTypeWrapper both exist? Should this be removed and the XML node names be fixed in the BlobContainers variant?
timeline.author: alzimmermsft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,40 @@
+// Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
+// Licensed under the MIT License.
+// Code generated by Microsoft (R) AutoRest Code Generator.
+
+package com.azure.storage.blob.implementation;

replies.bodyText:
Good point. Ideally both are not needed.
However, I didn't find a way to force generator to skip ListBlobContainersIncludeTypeWrapper, so I end result has just one wrapper.
I can see that similar issue exist for existing ListBlobsIncludeItemWrapper and ListBlobsIncludeItem pair - the wrapper is not used but exist.
replies.author: kasobol-msft
